title: Is it weird for someone to yodel while playing the accordion? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, for all the instruments you could play while yodelling, the accordion seems the most fitting. I mean if I try to think of yodelling and where it is done, I also associate many of the same cultures with some kind of an accordion-like instrument. So… yes. It’d be weird but only because of the yodelling. If you are going to yodel (and it being weird is definitely not a reason not to do that) while playing an instrument, accordion is probably the least weird option there is. Besides: "Somethings only not cool until you make it cool" - Ed Sheeran Do it well enough and it’ll be the coolest thing ever. Nobody will care if it’s weird.

I think this would be wonderful to hear! Perhaps not for too long though. I’ve personally never heard anyone yodelling and playing the accordion at the same time, and I'd imagine it would be very difficult.
